name: Reimu goes to Egypt
description:
Two Touhou anime girls get sent to Egypt to save the world by destroying the Ottoman Empire.

Featuring Roadtrip through Arabia, Anatolia, Greece, ALBANIA STRONK, Serbia, Austria and Ḳosṭanṭīnīye!

Characters like
  1.  Muhammad Ali and Ibrahim Basha from Egypt,
  2. Khalid from Arabia,
  3. Mahmud the second of the Ottoman Empire,
  4. Otto of Greece, 
  5. Giuseppe Garibaldi from Italy? (What is that a geographical expression?)
  6. Hong Xiuquan from Qing China (Saving the day)
  7. Reimu Hakurei and Doremy from Touhou Project.
